join hortbot 999 foobar 1


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin on
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join enabled for hortbot.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join set to: true

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin off
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join disabled for hortbot.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join set to: false

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin unset
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset for hortbot.

send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset.

send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset.

send hortbot #foobar [HB] Default public join enabled.

send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset.


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin otherbot
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin on otherbot
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join enabled for otherbot.


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin off
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join disabled for hortbot.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=999;user-id=2 :otheruser!otheruser@otheruser.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #hortbot :!join
no_send
no_notify_channel_updates


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin unset
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Public join unset for hortbot.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin publicjoin off default
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Default public join disabled.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=999;user-id=2 :otheruser!otheruser@otheruser.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #hortbot :!join
no_send
no_notify_channel_updates


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=999;user-id=2;testing-admin=1 :otheruser!otheruser@otheruser.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #hortbot :!join
send hortbot #hortbot [HB] otheruser, hortbot will join your channel soon with prefix !
notify_channel_updates hortbot
